name: gambit
content:
gambit noun [C]
(CLEVER ACTION)
Add to word list
Add to word list
a clever action in a game or other situation that is intended to achieve an advantage and usually involves taking a risk: opening gambit Her clever opening gambit gave her an early advantage. Their promise to lower taxes is clearly an election-year gambit.
games
  specialized a way of beginning a game of chess, in which you intentionally lose a pawn (= game piece) in order to win some other form of advantage later
